attributes.action: Ban swearing in all public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are approximately 50000 words in the English language - is it really so difficult not to use 15 of them? Why should people going to shops, restaurants, pubs and sports events have to listen to foul, abusive and offensive language such as "f##k" and "c##t" as they go about their business?

Obviously, there should be an exception for those with Tourette's and private venues should also be exempt but as with smoking, swearing should be banned in public places.
